item.description:
Ready to get inspired by fashion?

 

This is a workshop you must attend.
Fashion is all around us. Inspiration is influenced by so many things. As stylists we all have different roles. Photographers work to capture the moment; Set designers & prop stylists set the mood; makeup, hair and fashion stylist define the look. All of these elements begin with knowing the concept.


This event is not about creating a concept, its about capturing it.
Bring your camera, any camera will do. Be ready to capture fabulous and fun images on the streets of Boston to help you refine your skills.

This workshop is designed for all stylists:

Photographer with a desire to shoot fashion

Fashion, Wardrobe or Prop styist

Makeup & Hair stylist

Here is how this workshop will work....
I will provide you with a concept so you will know what to look for. You will then work within our surroundings to capture images that bring that concept to life. We will review your success and offer suggestions to help you continue to grow as a stylist.


Additional information and coaching will be provided to all attendees.

 

We will meet in Copley Square on the steps of Trinity Church facing the Boston Public Library.

group.name: Boston Beauty, Fashion and Photo Stylist

item.name: Boston Street Style
